description: Displays the template object (which includes the Subject line, HTML part and text part) for the template you specify. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template to retrieve.

nested_items.name: TemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the template. You use this name when you send email using the SendTemplatedEmail or SendBulkTemplatedEmail operations.

nested_items.name: SubjectPart
nested_items.description: The subject line of the email.

nested_items.name: TextPart
nested_items.description: The email body that is visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML content.

nested_items.name: HtmlPart
nested_items.description: The HTML body of the email.
